Report.Description: This report lists raw file evidence that has been excluded from app recognition processing.
Report.SearchSQL: WITH DATA AS ( SELECT cefe.[ComplianceConnectionID] ,cc.[ConnectionName] ,cefe.[FileName] ,cefe.[FileVersion] ,cefe.[FilePathID] ,cefe.[FilePath] ,cefe.[Company] ,cefe.[Description] ,cefe.[ProductVersion] ,cefe.[ProductName] ,cefe.[FileSize] ,cefe.[Language] FROM dbo.[CustomExcludedFileEvidence] cefe JOIN dbo.[ComplianceConnection] AS cc ON cc.[ComplianceConnectionID] = cefe.[ComplianceConnectionID] ) SELECT d.[ConnectionName] ,d.[FileName] ,d.[FileVersion] ,d.[FilePath] ,d.[Company] ,d.[Description] ,d.[ProductVersion] ,d.[ProductName] ,d.[FileSize] ,d.[Language] FROM DATA d ORDER BY d.[FileName], d.[FileVersion], d.[FilePath], d.[ConnectionName]
